source.63d56be5:
# Set a default crs 
crs = {'init': 'epsg:4326'}
neighbourhood.to_crs(crs,inplace=True)

#Define the centroids
y=neighbourhood.centroid.y.iloc[0]
x=neighbourhood.centroid.x.iloc[0]

#Map

base = folium.Map([y, x], zoom_start=11, tiles='OpenStreetMap')
base.choropleth(neighbourhood)
base
source.a52aa3af:
#Base Map
base = folium.Map([y, x], zoom_start=11, tiles='OpenStreetMap')

for i in range(len(neighbourhood)):
    geo = folium.GeoJson(neighbourhood[i: i + 1],name=neighbourhood['NM_BAIRRO'][i])
    label = '{} - {} Area (Km²)'.format(neighbourhood['NM_BAIRRO'][i], neighbourhood['Area'][i])
    folium.Popup(label).add_to(geo)
    geo.add_to(base)
    
#Layers cntrol 
folium.LayerControl().add_to(base)

# #Save
base.save('Belém (PA).html')

#Show
base

source.443b82ff:
## Pará - Brazil
(Wikipedia)

Pará is a State of Brazil, located in northern Brazil and traversed by the lower Amazon River. It borders the Brazilian states of Amapá, Maranhão, Tocantins, Mato Grosso, Amazonas and Roraima. To the northwest are the borders of Guyana and Suriname, to the northeast of Pará is the Atlantic Ocean. The capital and largest city is Belém, which is located at the mouth of the Amazon.
source.3a64ef17:
## Python GeoPandas

GeoPandas is an open source project that was created to make manipulating geospatial data in Python a simpler task. It extends the data structures of Pandas, which are the dataframe and the series, enabling the manipulation and treatment of files of this nature. In addition, it has a number of important dependencies, including: shapely, which supports geometric operations; fiona, which allows access to files with geographic information; and Matplotlib, which allows the plotting of graphs and geometric figures.
source.2770e838:
# 2.Folium - Belém
(in:<https://medium.com/@datalivre/folium-d6036a9ad29c>)

Folium is a library that, as it says on its own homepage, is based on the strengths of the Python ecosystem and the mapping forces of the Leaflet.js library. This means that we can manipulate the data using a programming language and view the result immediately on an interactive map. Folium also supports image overlays, video GeoJSON and TopoJSON.
